title: Alpha Client Bug - Hextech crafting - "Open 10 Chests"
body:
Hello,

I was just looking around the PBE Alpha Client today and noticed while looking at the Hextech Crafting tab that when you select "Open 10 Chests" that it'll open just one instead of 10. Not sure if someone reported this before.

replies.body: Working as intended, you can only open one each time.
